00182 template <typename T> class CMat
00183 {
00184  private:
00185   T *mat;
00186   int nr, nc;
00187   void del();
00188  public:
00189   CMat();
00190   CMat(int rows, int cols);
00191   ~CMat();
00192   void resize(int rows, int cols);
00193   void resetDer();
00194   int getNrows() { return nr; };
00195   int getNcols() { return nc; };
00196   T norm2();
00197   T& operator () (int row, int col);
00198   CMat<T>& operator = (const CMat<T>&);
00199 };
00200 
00201 template <typename T> CMat<T>::CMat()
00202 {
00203   nr=0;
00204   nc=0;
00205   mat = new T[nr*nc];
00206 }
00207 
00208 template <typename T> CMat<T>::CMat(int rows, int cols)
00209 {
00210   nr = rows;
00211   nc = cols;
00212   mat = new T[nr*nc];
00213 }
00214 
00215 template <typename T> CMat<T>::~CMat()
00216 {
00217   del();
00218 }
00219 
00220 template <typename T> void CMat<T>::del()
00221 {
00222   delete[] mat;
00223 }
00224 
00225 template <typename T> void CMat<T>::resize(int rows, int cols)
00226 {
00227   if (nr!=rows || nc!=cols) {
00228     del();
00229     nr = rows;
00230     nc = cols;
00231     mat = new T[nr*nc];
00232   }
00233 }
00234 
00235 template <typename T> T CMat<T>::norm2()
00236 {
00237   T norm = 0;
00238   int i,j;
00239   for (i=0;i<nr;i++)
00240     for (j=0;j<nc;j++)
00241       norm += mat[i*nc+j]*mat[i*nc+j];
00242       
00243   return sqrt(norm);
00244 }
00245 
00246 template <typename T> T& CMat<T>::operator() (int row, int col)
00247 {
00248   return mat[row*nc+col];
00249 }
00250 
00251 template <typename T> CMat<T>& CMat<T>::operator = (const CMat<T>& param)
00252 {
00253   resize(param.nr, param.nc);
00254   for (int i=0; i<nr*nc; i++)
00255     mat[i]=param.mat[i];
00256 
00257   return *this;
00258 }

00262 template <typename T> void mat_inverse_3d(CMat<T> &J, CMat<T> &IJ, T &dJ, T &IdJ)
00263 {
00264   dJ = J(0,0)*J(1,1)*J(2,2) + J(1,0)*J(2,1)*J(0,2) + J(2,0)*J(0,1)*J(1,2)
00265       -J(0,0)*J(2,1)*J(1,2) - J(1,0)*J(0,1)*J(2,2) - J(2,0)*J(1,1)*J(0,2);
00266   IdJ=1.0;
00267   IdJ=IdJ/dJ;
00268   
00269   IJ(0,0)=IdJ*(J(1,1)*J(2,2)-J(2,1)*J(1,2));
00270   IJ(0,1)=IdJ*(J(0,2)*J(2,1)-J(2,2)*J(0,1));
00271   IJ(0,2)=IdJ*(J(0,1)*J(1,2)-J(1,1)*J(0,2));
00272   IJ(1,0)=IdJ*(J(1,2)*J(2,0)-J(2,2)*J(1,0));
00273   IJ(1,1)=IdJ*(J(0,0)*J(2,2)-J(2,0)*J(0,2));
00274   IJ(1,2)=IdJ*(J(0,2)*J(1,0)-J(1,2)*J(0,0));
00275   IJ(2,0)=IdJ*(J(1,0)*J(2,1)-J(2,0)*J(1,1));
00276   IJ(2,1)=IdJ*(J(0,1)*J(2,0)-J(2,1)*J(0,0));
00277   IJ(2,2)=IdJ*(J(0,0)*J(1,1)-J(1,0)*J(0,1));
00278 }
00279 
00280 // nasledujici funkce spocita pseudo-inverzi matice J typu 2x3, dJ = sqrt(det(J^T*J))
00281 template <typename T> void mat_pseudoinverse_2x3(CMat<T> &J, CMat<T> &IJ, T &dJ, T &IdJ)
00282 {
00283   dJ  = (J(0,0)*J(0,0)+J(0,1)*J(0,1)+J(0,2)*J(0,2))*(J(1,0)*J(1,0)+J(1,1)*J(1,1)+J(1,2)*J(1,2))
00284        -(J(0,0)*J(1,0)+J(0,1)*J(1,1)+J(0,2)*J(1,2))*(J(0,0)*J(1,0)+J(0,1)*J(1,1)+J(0,2)*J(1,2));
00285   IdJ = (T)1.0/dJ;
00286   
00287   IJ(0,0) = IdJ*(J(0,0)*J(1,1)*J(1,1) + J(0,0)*J(1,2)*J(1,2) - J(1,0)*J(0,1)*J(1,1) - J(1,0)*J(0,2)*J(1,2));
00288   IJ(0,1) = IdJ*(J(1,0)*J(0,1)*J(0,1) + J(1,0)*J(0,2)*J(0,2) - J(0,0)*J(0,1)*J(1,1) - J(0,0)*J(0,2)*J(1,2));
00289   IJ(1,0) = IdJ*(J(0,1)*J(1,0)*J(1,0) + J(0,1)*J(1,2)*J(1,2) - J(0,0)*J(1,0)*J(1,1) - J(0,2)*J(1,1)*J(1,2));
00290   IJ(1,1) = IdJ*(J(0,0)*J(0,0)*J(1,1) + J(1,1)*J(0,2)*J(0,2) - J(0,0)*J(1,0)*J(0,1) - J(0,1)*J(0,2)*J(1,2));
00291   IJ(2,0) = IdJ*(J(1,0)*J(1,0)*J(0,2) + J(1,1)*J(1,1)*J(0,2) - J(0,0)*J(1,0)*J(1,2) - J(0,1)*J(1,1)*J(1,2));
00292   IJ(2,1) = IdJ*(J(0,0)*J(0,0)*J(1,2) + J(0,1)*J(0,1)*J(1,2) - J(0,0)*J(1,0)*J(0,2) - J(0,1)*J(1,1)*J(0,2));
00293   
00294   dJ = sqrt(dJ);
00295 }
00296 
00297 template <typename T> void mat_inverse_2d(CMat<T> &J, CMat<T> &IJ, T &dJ, T &IdJ)
00298 {
00299   dJ  = J(0,0)*J(1,1)-J(1,0)*J(0,1);
00300   IdJ = 1.0;
00301   IdJ = IdJ/dJ;
00302   IJ(0,0)=IdJ*J(1,1);
00303   IJ(0,1)=-IdJ*J(0,1);
00304   IJ(1,0)=-IdJ*J(1,0);
00305   IJ(1,1)=IdJ*J(0,0);
00306 }
00307 
00308 template <typename T> void mat_pseudoinverse_1x3(CMat<T> &J, CMat<T> &IJ, T &dJ, T &IdJ)
00309 {
00310   dJ  = J(0,0)*J(0,0)+J(0,1)*J(0,1)+J(0,2)*J(0,2);
00311   IdJ = 1.0;
00312   IdJ = IdJ/dJ;
00313   IJ(0,0)=IdJ*J(0,0);
00314   IJ(1,0)=IdJ*J(0,1);
00315   IJ(2,0)=IdJ*J(0,2);
00316   dJ = sqrt(dJ);
00317 }
